faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here we have gathered answers to the most common questions

items.question: What is ReadyPixelGo?
items.answer: ReadyPixelGo is Sweden's first interactive arcade floor! We offer a unique experience where you use your body to play games on an LED floor. Perfect for families and groups of friends.

items.question: How much does it cost to play?
items.answer: The price varies depending on group size and age. You will see the final price when booking here on the website.

items.question: How many people can be in a room?
items.answer: Currently, we have one room available where a maximum of 6 players can participate simultaneously.

items.question: Do I need to change clothes?
items.answer: We prefer that you bring your own indoor shoes for the best grip and safety. Comfortable clothes are recommended. It is also possible to play in socks.

items.question: What is the age limit?
items.answer: The game is suitable for all ages from about 6 years and up. Children under 12 should play accompanied by an adult.

items.question: When can I book?
items.answer: We are currently open for bookings, welcome to reserve your spot! Check the booking calendar to see if there are available time slots.

items.question: How do I get there?
items.answer: We are located in the Solna Access building. Go to the reception and contact the staff to be guided to the venue.

items.question: How long is a session?
items.answer: A game session is approximately 45 minutes long.

items.question: Is the price per person or per room?
When should we arrive?
items.answer: You should arrive 10 minutes before your booked time to have time to change shoes and go through the game rules.

cards.subtitle: Blue & Green = Safe
